Text:
Hi,

Can you upload the DVDRip/BRRip/BDRip of the following (or any of the following) movies WITH English subs (soft subs preferred, but hard subs will also be fine if no soft subs are available)?

1] Biutiful - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1164999/

2] A-i-deul... (aka Children...) - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1861982/

3] Insidious - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1591095/

I'll be very grateful if you can do any of them, especially A-i-deul... Hope you can. If you can't, please reply and let me know. Thanks.
Thank you, for the fast upload. been waiting a long time for this

thanks a lot for this series!
does anybody have english subtitles for it?
Thank you very much. I appreciate this, and will burn a sacrifice for you. (If my cooking is as bad as usual)

nice work TvTeam!  I too have been waiting for this ever since that kickass first season ended.

many thanks.
